statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY date_completed DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_id, game_name, activity_completed, score FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 100
SELECT DISTINCT game_name FROM StudentProgressReports
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY score ASC
SELECT activity_completed, COUNT(*) as total FROM StudentProgressReports GROUP BY activity_completed ORDER BY total DESC
SELECT student_id, game_name, score FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY score DESC, date_completed ASC, game_name
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 1 AND date_completed >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT game_name FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE score >= 90
SELECT AVG(score) as average_score FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 2
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE date_completed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, game_score FROM students ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_category FROM games WHERE released_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE game_score BETWEEN 80 AND 100;
SELECT student_name, game_name, game_score FROM students JOIN games ON students.student_id = games.game_id;
SELECT student_name, game_name FROM students, games WHERE students.student_id = games.game_id AND game_category = 'Action'
SELECT * FROM students WHERE game_score > 100 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_name, game_name, released_date FROM students JOIN games ON students.student_id = games.game_id ORDER BY released_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT game_category FROM games WHERE released_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, student_name, game_name FROM students LEFT JOIN games ON students.game_score = games.game_id
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20
SELECT game_name, difficulty_level FROM Games ORDER BY game_name DESC
SELECT student_id, completion_status FROM Progress WHERE completion_status='completed'
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Progress ON Students.student_id = Progress.student_id
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20
SELECT name, age FROM Students
SELECT game_name, difficulty_level FROM Games ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC
SELECT name, game_name FROM Students JOIN Progress ON Students.student_id = Progress.student_id JOIN Games ON Progress.game_id = Games.game_id WHERE completion_status = 'complete'
SELECT * FROM Progress WHERE game_id IN (SELECT game_id FROM Games WHERE difficulty_level = 'hard') ORDER BY progress_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, game_level FROM Students WHERE game_level > 5;
SELECT game_title, game_genre FROM Games ORDER BY game_genre DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Quiz';
SELECT student_id, progress_date, progress_score FROM Progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, game_level, progress_status FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Games WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY game_genre DESC;
SELECT activity_name, game_title FROM Activities INNER JOIN Games ON Activities.game_id = Games.game_id WHERE game_genre = 'Adventure';

SELECT student_name, game_title, progress_score FROM Students JOIN Progress ON Students.student_id = Progress.student_id JOIN Activities ON Progress.activity_id = Activities.activity_id WHERE progress_score >= 80 ORDER BY progress_score DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) FROM Activities GROUP BY activity_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT game_name, difficulty_level FROM games WHERE difficulty_level < 3;
SELECT activity_name, duration FROM activities ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT s.name, a.activity_name FROM students s JOIN student_activities sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id JOIN activities a ON sa.activity_id = a.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, class FROM students WHERE age > 20 AND class = 'A';
SELECT s.name, g.game_name, p.completion_status FROM students s INNER JOIN progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id INNER JOIN games g ON p.game_id = g.game_id WHERE p.completion_status = true;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score, MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM progress;

SELECT s.name AS student_name, a.activity_name AS activity_name, sa.activity_date AS completion_date FROM students s INNER JOIN student_activities sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id INNER JOIN activities a ON sa.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE sa.completed = true ORDER BY sa.activity_date DESC;
